讚.definition: variant of 贊|赞[zan4]; to praise

讚不絕口.definition: to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven

讚同.definition: to approve of; to endorse; (vote) in favor

讚揚.definition: to praise; to approve of; to show approval

讚美.definition: to admire; to praise; to eulogize

讚賞.definition: to admire; to praise; to appreciate
